yaml.title: Links & Resources
yaml.abstract: These are my favorite research and reference sources on ecological science, GIS, coding in R, and much more.

markdown.markdown:
Everyone has certain websites and other reference material they always come back to. This page outlines those on my list. Feel free to bookmark these for your use as well. If you have suggestions on additions, please reach out.

### Job Resources

- [Blog Post ~ Job Boards To Find An Impactful Career in Nature](https://conservationcompanion.com/blog/job-boards-to-find-an-impactful-career-in-nature)
- [Website ~ Careers in Conservation Job Board List](https://diversityinconservationjobs.org/jobs/)

### Reproducible Reporting

- [Website ~ Quarto from Posit](https://quarto.org/)

### Mapping and Spatial Data

- [Website ~ RSpatial: Spatial Data Science in R](https://rspatial.org/)

## Resources for **GIS Users**

### ArcGIS - Learning
